name: Boo Xboo Hec
description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

en.name: Boo Xboo Hec
en.description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

fr.name: Boo Xboo Hec
fr.description: Stake du {{token}} sur [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) pour recevoir du xBOO qui est staké pour gagner du HEC. Les jetons gagnés sont récoltés, vendus pour plus de {{token}} qui sont ensuite redéposés dans la stratégie .

es.name: Boo Xboo Hec
es.description: Hace staking de {{token}} en [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) para recibir xBOO con el cual se hace staking para ganar HEC. Los tokens ganados se cosechan, se venden por más {{token}} que se deposita nuevamente en la estrategia.

tr.name: Boo Xboo Hec
tr.description: HEC kazanmak için stake edilen xBOO'yu almak için [SpookySwap](https://www.oxdao.fi)'de {{token}} stake eder. Kazanılan jetonlar toplanır, stratejiye geri yatırılan daha fazla {{token}} karşılığında satılır.

vi.name: Boo Xboo Hec
vi.description: Stakes {{token}} in [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) to receive xBOO which is staked to earn HEC. Earned tokens are harvested, sold for more {{token}} which is deposited back into the strategy.

zh.name: Boo Xboo Hec
zh.description: 将 {{token}} 质押到 [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) 以获取 xBOO，质押 xBOO 以赚取 HEC。收获到的代币会被卖掉，换为更多的 {{token}} 并进行复投。

hi.name: Boo Xboo Hec
hi.description: xBOO प्राप्त करने के लिए [SpookySwap](https://spookyswap.finance) में {{token}} दांव लगाएं, जो HEC कमाने के लिए दांव पर लगा है। अर्जित टोकन काटा जाता है, अधिक {{token}} के लिए बेचा जाता है जिसे वापस रणनीति में जमा किया जाता है।
